segments.text: I see the woman drying her dishes, her focus unwavering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so absorbed that it seems surreal, like she’s living in a bubble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a wave of sadness looking at the puddle at her feet, growing by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see what’s happening right before her eyes?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are a world of mischief, climbing and reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their laughter floats through the air, innocent and delightful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can’t shake the anxiety that fills my chest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is teetering on that stool, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach out, to warn them of how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how one small act of stealing cookies can escalate into chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice their excitement, and it makes it hard for me to frown completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my heart sinks thinking of the potential for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast of joy and impending danger is striking, almost poetic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I long to capture this moment forever, yet I fear what might come next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In the beautiful domestic space, everything feels like it could fall apart at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
